tokens.text: swims randomly to explore the water

generated_doNotEdit.title: Swim Wander Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity to wander around while swimming, when not path-finding.

fields.title: Interval
fields.description: Percent chance to start wandering, when not path-finding. 1 = 100%

fields.title: Look Ahead
fields.description: Distance to look ahead for obstacle avoidance, while wandering.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: This multiplier modifies the entity's speed when wandering.

fields.title: Wander Time
fields.description: Amount of time (in seconds) to wander after wandering behavior was successfully started.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
